content: We've not had great success with the google group + google meet thing working for it showing up and updating on everyone's calendars. So, I've created a sharable google calendar with a google workspace (because it doesn't work on normal accounts) attached to my domain esottera.dev (so that it isn't attached to a company) and I want to see if we can get everything on that calendar and start embedding it places. I'm going to meet with each of the subgroup co-chairs to get this figured out.

Here's a link to the WIP calendar. I'll try and get it added to the meetings repo GL SIG readme
https://calendar.google.com/calendar/u/0/embed?src=c_f06c8329517327250b1176fbfc16a631329912a585aeb93f8954fdb33cc58573@group.calendar.google.com&ctz=America/New_York&csspa=1
